nodes.text: Chandar's Folly was a planet located in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. During or before the time of the High Republic, the Jedi Knight Te'Ami attended a rodeo on Chandar's Folly. In 14 BBY, Governor Wilhuff Tarkin and nineteen other hunters hunted the Sith Lord Darth Vader on Chandar's Folly. By the ninth day of the hunt, only eight, including Tarkin, remained.
